documentation.title: Class Instantiation
documentation.standard: Instantiation of an object should be done with parenthesis.
Don't use spaces between the object name and the open parenthesis when instantiating new object.

code.title: Valid: no whitespace between the object name and the parenthesis.
Invalid: a space between the object name and the parenthesis.

documentation.standard: Assigning the return value of "new" by reference was deprecated in PHP 5.3 and removed in PHP 7.0. New by reference should no longer be used.
